function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Microbiological contaminants in water tanks during building closures","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and adherence to covid-19 safety precautions in workplaces","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of infection from contaminated office surfaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need for efficient airflow and room sanitation","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation systems in workplaces leading to the spread of covid-19","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overcrowding in open office layouts facilitating viral transmission","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High-speed elevators in multistory office buildings becoming places of high infection spread propensity","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of sars-cov-2 virus in closed office spaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Respiratory spread of the novel coronavirus under low temperature and low relative humidity rh conditions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential rapid spread of covid-19 in office workplaces due to close proximity of workers.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate infection control efforts leading to continuous exposure of workers to recirculated infected air in workplace environments.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health and social workers have higher risk infectivity based on proximity and aggregation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Workers in different sectors cannot be effectively protected from covid-19 by a single safety guideline or protocol","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in closed workplace environments","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to maintain safe working distance in certain industries , meat processing","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Intrinsic work patterns in the health sector leading to high vulnerability to covid-19","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to regularly assess workplace hazards","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of sars-cov-2 in indoor climate-controlled environments","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of covid-19 health regulations in workplaces","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited scope of literature review may lead to oversight of important information regarding covid-19 transmission in office environments.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on information from blog sites may introduce bias or inaccuracies in the understanding of covid-19 transmission and prevention in office environments.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete understanding of sars-cov-2 transmission dynamics and preventive measures in office settings may lead to inadequate protection against covid-19 transmission.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for infection spreading in office buildings and workplaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deficiencies in office buildings and layouts contributing to infection spreading propensity","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate covid-19 regulations and guidelines in offices","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of sector-specific pandemic control regulations and guidelines","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequacies in building sustainability ratings and environmental impact assessments","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective spatial distribution of living spaces for epidemic control","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Customers’ preferences redirected from hypermarkets to decentralized commercial places due to fear of covid-19, leading to increased crowding in smaller spaces.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift in urban design towards decentralized and restructuring of public spaces due to covid-19 concerns.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Positive correlation between meteorological variables, air quality, and covid-19 cases and deaths.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of workplace regulations and directives to mitigate covid-19 transmission among workers and visitors.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fast transmission rates of the virus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 virus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of increased psychosocial needs due to the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate mental health support for patients and the public during a contagious disease outbreak","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate mental health support for healthcare providers during a contagious disease outbreak","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overwhelmed health care systems due to stress on individual providers and general operations during a contagious disease outbreak","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large-scale home confinement limiting direct patient encounters","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Psychosocial assessment should include covid-19-related stressors and secondary
